mapper.select: SELECT sch_no, sch_title, sch_content, sch_sdate, sch_edate, sch_color, sch_dept, emp_no FROM SCHEDULE WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}
SELECT sch_no, sch_title, sch_content, sch_sdate, sch_edate, sch_color, sch_dept, emp_no FROM SCHEDULE WHERE sch_dept = #{schDept}
SELECT to_number(todo_no) as todo_no, emp_no, todo_content FROM todolist WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} ORDER BY todo_no
